mapper.select: SELECT id FROM Board WHERE writer = #{memberId}

SELECT b.id, b.title, b.content, b.writer, b.inserted, b.updated, m.nickName, COUNT(r.id) replyCount, (SELECT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM File WHERE boardId = b.id)) hasFile FROM Board b JOIN Member m ON b.writer = m.id LEFT JOIN Reply r ON b.id = r.boardId GROUP BY b.id ORDER BY b.id DESC LIMIT #{from}, #{items}
SELECT b.id, b.title, b.content, b.writer, b.inserted, b.updated, m.nickName FROM Board b JOIN Member m ON b.writer = m.id ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT b.id, b.title, b.content, b.writer, b.inserted, b.updated, m.nickName FROM Board b JOIN Member m ON b.writer = m.id WHERE b.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Board (title, content, writer) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer})
mapper.update: UPDATE Board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, writer = #{writer}, updated = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
